title: Retro Game 16bit Sound Pack
description: Retro Game 16bit Sound Pack contains 306 authentic sound effects and one loopable music track, perfect for bringing classic old-school vibes to your game. Ideal for any retro-themed project.
longDescription:
🔈View Sound List

🔈View Video Demo


Bring the classic retro vibes to your game with the Retro Game 16bit Sound Pack! This meticulously crafted sound pack contains a total of 306 authentic 16-bit sound effects designed to evoke the nostalgia of old-school gaming. From iconic blips and bloops to classic arcade hits, this pack covers all the essential sounds needed to create an immersive retro gaming experience.

In addition to the sound effects, the pack also includes one seamlessly loopable music track, perfect for setting the mood and enhancing the retro atmosphere of your game.

Whether you’re developing a platformer, shooter, puzzle game, or any other genre that celebrates the golden age of video gaming, the Retro Game 16bit Sound Pack has you covered. With a wide variety of sounds, you can easily find the perfect effect to fit any in-game action, event, or ambiance.

Ideal for indie developers and retro enthusiasts, this pack provides all the audio assets you need to make your game stand out and resonate with players who love the charm of classic games.
technicalDetails:
Audio file types: .Wav

Sample rate: 44,100Hz Sample Rate

Number of Audio Waves: 306

Number of Audio Cues: 306

Additional: Stereo

Do Sound Fx Loop: No

Windows and Mac:Yes

Support Dev Platarform: Yes

-Dynamic sound

-Well ogranized
